Increase your zazzle creator's experience even more with this awesome super-powered extension that will help you niche down your research, find popular and trending niches, extract effective keywords and even more. 

Instead of designing and uploading massive amount of designs just use this awesome tool to find the perfect niche for you that works best.

What Parameters can you use to sort items?

âœ… Total order count of all time.

âœ… How many people have this design in cart?

Some Features this extension adds to your zazzle experience:
